channel.title: Code on Jingtao Lai
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Jingtao Lai

item.title: PISM
item.description: The parallel Ice Sheet Model (PISM) is an open source, finite difference, shallow ice sheet model (website). I implement subglacial erosion in PISM to model glacial landscape evolution in mountain ranges.

item.title: Landlab
item.description: Landlab is a python-based toolkit for modeling earth surface processes. Website. I implement the FlowRouterOverFlat module that calculates the ﬂow direction across topography with ﬂats. Get source code from Github.
